main-text:
Easier to use
Windows 95 is the easiest Windows yet! The new improved 
interface is simpler and more intuitive to use. You can:


 - Click the Start button to quickly open programs, find
documents, and use system tools.

 - Use the taskbar to switch between programs as easily as
changing channels on your TV.

 - Use long filenames to make your files easier to organize
and find.
